word_mean: 由属性特征比较相近的互相连接成组的网格或像元。

sentence.Network_en: Chinese waiters stood in a cluster, sharing a private joke.
sentence.Network_cn: 华人服务生们站在一起，讲着只有他们自己才懂的笑话。

sentence.Network_en: The illustration shows a cluster of five roses coloured apricot orange.
sentence.Network_cn: 插图上是一簇杏橙色的玫瑰，一共5朵。

sentence.Network_en: A cluster of vultures crouched on the carcass of a dead buffalo.
sentence.Network_cn: 一群秃鹫蹲伏在一具野牛的尸体上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 集群和负载均衡的概念集群(Cluster)所谓集群是指一组独立的计算机系统构成的一个松耦合的多处理器系统，它们之间通过网络实现进 …
群集抽样法即将母体按某种标准分为若干群集(cluster) ; 其次，以群集为抽样单位。然后，由这些群集中用简单随机抽样法抽出若干群 …
簇（cluster），我们知道磁盘是由一个一个扇区组成的，若干个扇区合为一个簇，文件存取是以簇为单位的，哪怕这个文件只有1个字 …
个丛集(cluster)，则以丛集配置方式复制M次之后，可以代表一个蜂巢系统的频道总數C，其实就是系统的通讯容量 C = MkN = MT 发 …

list.abs: 词汇表 ... server certificate / 服务器证书 server cluster / 服务器群集 server node / 服务器节点.
丛集性头痛（cluster headache）又称组胺性头痛紧张型头痛 　　紧张型头痛：又称肌收缩型头痛头痛部位较弥散可位前额双颞顶.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... cannon 火炮 cluster bomb 集束炸弹 copter 直升机.
chapter1 ... 1.基因家族( gene family) 2.基因簇( gene cluster) (二)重叠基因( overlapping gene).

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English clyster; probably related to clot

entry.def: A cluster of people or things is a small group of them close together.

example.tran: 一群群身着正装的男人

example.ex: There's no town here, just a cluster of shops, cabins and motels at the side of the highway.
example.tran: 这儿没有城镇，只在公路边上有一片商店、小木屋和汽车旅馆。

entry.def: If people cluster together, they gather together in a small group.

example.ex: The passengers clustered together in small groups...
example.tran: 乘客们三五成群聚在一起。
孩子们聚集在我的周围。

means.word_mean: 1. a grouping of a number of similar things;
1. come together as in a cluster or flock;

sentences.sentence: "The poets constellate in this town every summer"

means.word_mean: 2. gather or cause to gather into a cluster;

sentences.sentence: "She bunched her fingers into a fist"
"The students bunched up at the registration desk"

auth_sentence.content: Cluster bombs have also been used, she said.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cluster bombs have also been used, she said.

auth_sentence.content: It is perceptible only at the galactic cluster level.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is perceptible only at the galactic cluster level.

Sentence.sentence: Countries with the highest scores tend to be clustered in the West, where gender discrimination is against the law, and equal rights are constitutionally enshrined(神圣化).

sentences.en: She held a cluster of flowers in her arms.
A cluster of tourists was surrounded in the hill.
sentences.cn: 一群游客被困在了山中。

sentences.en: People clustered round the notice board.
sentences.cn: 人们聚集在布告栏周围。

jushi.english: She held a cluster of flowers in her arms.
A cluster of tourists was surrounded in the hill.
People clustered round the notice board.
jushi.chinese: 人们聚集在布告栏周围。
